hero.title: Empowering Agriculture from Soil to Sale on {appName}
hero.subtitle: The single platform connecting every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain for a more transparent, efficient, and sustainable future.

features.title: DamDoh's Main Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to grow, connect, and trade, all in one place.

networking.title: Intelligent Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions to link you with the right partners, from suppliers to international buyers.

marketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products and services directly, increasing transparency and profitability for all stakeholders.

forums.title: Topical Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge, discuss challenges, and collaborate on solutions in topic-specific forums.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find specialized agricultural services, from on-demand harvesting to drone surveys.

forWho.title: One Platform for the Entire Value Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is uniquely designed to serve the entire agricultural ecosystem, creating a single point of truth and opportunity for all.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access better markets, find quality inputs, and get expert advice to increase yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from growers and co-ops, ensuring supply chain reliability.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your specialized skills and services to a wide agricultural audience seeking your expertise.

fis.title: Financial Institutions
fis.description: Provide targeted loans, grants, and insurance products to a verified network of agricultural businesses.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Join the Agricultural Revolution
cta.subtitle: Sign up today and become part of a growing global network dedicated to transforming the future of food.

Auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
Auth.recoverWithUniversalIdPrompt: Or recover access with your Universal ID
Auth.signUpDescription: Tell us a bit about yourself to get started.
Auth.namePlaceholder: e.g., Chan Nary or Green Valley Farms
Auth.rolePlaceholder: Select your role in the supply chain...
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: No problem. Enter your email address below, and we'll send you a link to reset it.
Auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter and confirm your new password below.

recoverPage.title: Recover Your Account
recoverPage.description: Use your network to regain access.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start a recovery session.
recoverPage.step2: Show the temporary QR code to a trusted friend on DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Once your friend scans the code to verify your identity, you'll regain access.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted DamDoh contact scan this QR code using the 'Help a Friend Recover' feature in their app.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is temporary and expires in 10 minutes.

enterPhone.title: Enter Your Phone Number
enterPhone.description: We will use your phone number to find your account and start a recovery session.
enterPhone.genericError: Could not start recovery session. Please check the number and try again.

helpFriend.prompt: Trying to help someone recover their account?
helpFriend.scanError: The scanned QR code is not a valid recovery code.
helpFriend.scanFail: Could not read the QR code. Please try again.

forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: A password reset link has been sent to {email}.
forgotPassword.emailSentDescriptionIfAccountExists: If an account with {email} exists, a password reset link has been sent.
forgotPassword.successDescription: Please check your inbox (and spam folder) for the password reset link.

errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

resetPassword.successDescription: You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.successRedirect: You will be redirected to the sign-in page shortly.

errors.missingCode: Invalid password reset link. Please request a new one.
errors.missingCodeDescription: The password reset link is missing or invalid. Please return to the 'Forgot Password' page to request a new one.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidOrExpiredCode: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.userDisabled: This user account has been disabled.
errors.userNotFound: No user found corresponding to this reset link.
errors.weakPassword: The new password is not strong enough.

errors.emailInUse: This email is already in use.
errors.weakPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters.

signUpSuccess.title: Account Created & Signed In!
signUpSuccess.description: Welcome to {appName}! You have been successfully signed in.

logOut.title: Logged Out
logOut.description: You have been successfully logged out.

logoutFailed.title: Logout Failed
logoutFailed.description: Could not log you out. Please try again.

errors.invalidCredential: The email or password you entered is incorrect.

logOut.title: Logged Out
logOut.description: You have been successfully signed out.

logOut.failDescription: There was an error logging you out.

pro.unlock: Unlock more insights with DamDoh Pro.
pro.title: Coming Soon!
pro.description: DamDoh Pro features are currently under development.

feedError.title: Error Loading Feed
feedError.description: Could not retrieve the latest activity. Please check your connection.

postError.auth: You must be signed in to post.
postError.fail: Failed to create post. Please try again.

postSuccess.title: Post Created!
postSuccess.description: Your update has been shared with the network.

likeError.auth: You must sign in to like a post.
likeError.fail: Could not like post. Please try again.

commentError.auth: You must be signed in to comment.

deleteError.auth: You must be signed in to delete a post.

deleteSuccess.title: Post Deleted
deleteSuccess.description: Your post has been successfully removed.

MainDashboard.noActivity: No recent activity in your network. Start a conversation or explore the marketplace!

DashboardRightSidebar.infoTooltip: AI-powered suggestions based on your profile and activity.
DashboardRightSidebar.promotionsDescription: Create and manage coupons to attract more customers.
DashboardRightSidebar.adDescription: Access real-time pricing and trends for your products.
DashboardRightSidebar.loadError: Could not load suggestions at this time.
DashboardRightSidebar.signInPrompt: Sign in to see personalized suggestions.
DashboardRightSidebar.noSuggestions: No new suggestions right now. Check back later!

toast.signInToConnect: Please sign in to connect with users.
toast.requestSentDescription: Your request has been sent. You will be notified when they accept.

AppFooter.tagline: The global platform for the agricultural supply chain.
